mapper.insert: insert into ecs_keyword (w_id, searchengine, word, keyword, letter, items, updatetime, total_search, month_search, week_search, today_search, status, keyword_cat, keyword_cat_url, keyword_cat_count ) values (#{w_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{searchengine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{letter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{items,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{total_search,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{month_search,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{week_search,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{today_search,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{keyword_cat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword_cat_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword_cat_count,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update ecs_keyword set searchengine = #{searchengine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, word = #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, letter = #{letter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, items = #{items,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_search = #{total_search,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month_search = #{month_search,jdbcType=INTEGER}, week_search = #{week_search,jdbcType=INTEGER}, today_search = #{today_search,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, keyword_cat = #{keyword_cat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword_cat_url = #{keyword_cat_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword_cat_count = #{keyword_cat_count,jdbcType=INTEGER} where w_id = #{w_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select w_id, searchengine, word, keyword, letter, items, updatetime, total_search, month_search, week_search, today_search, status, keyword_cat, keyword_cat_url, keyword_cat_count from ecs_keyword where w_id = #{w_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select w_id, searchengine, word, keyword, letter, items, updatetime, total_search, month_search, week_search, today_search, status, keyword_cat, keyword_cat_url, keyword_cat_count from ecs_keyword
